thread.title: Alveda King: People Believe Trump's a Racist Because of 'Fake News' - Fox Nation

title: Alveda King: People Believe Trump's a Racist Because of 'Fake News' - Fox Nation

organizations.name: national museum of african american history

text:
Alveda King: People Believe Trump's a Racist Because of 'Fake News' Published February 21, 2017 Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre 0 Email Print 
By Josh Feldman | Mediaite 
Dr. Alveda King, niece of Martin Luther King, Jr., was on Fox News tonight to discuss President Trump after appearing with him at the National Museum of African American History and Culture today. 
She spoke to Bill O’Reilly about how she liked Trump early on in the 2016 race due to his positions on a range of issues.
